description: The round payoff this round was 3. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 3.
The game's outcome heavily depends on the strategy and the round input, with the potential for positive payoffs if players can successfully diverge in their choices
Knowing the default action of the opponent (John chooses option 1 by default) can influence your strategy, potentially encouraging you to choose option 2 to gain a positive payoff

The fact that John knows your default action (though not explicitly stated) implies that he might adjust his strategy based on this knowledge, potentially leading to a more complex strategic interaction between players
